DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : We conduct randomize control trial ( RCT ) Students Nutrition eXercise ( SNaX ) , middle-school-based obesity-prevention intervention combine school-wide environmental change , multimedia , encouragement eat healthy school cafeteria food , peer-led education marketing . Methods : We randomly select school Los Angeles Unified School District ( LAUSD ) assign five intervention group five wait-list control group . School record obtain number fruit vegetable serve , student serve lunch , snack sell per attend student . Pre- post-intervention survey assess psychosocial variable among 2,997 seventh-graders ( 75 % seventh-graders across school ) . Hypotheses : For RCT SNaX , hypothesize SNaX would lead increase proportion student serve cafeteria ( SNaX market cafeterias ' healthy food ) ; increase fruit vegetable serving ( SNaX increase access sliced/bite-sized fruit vegetable ) ; decrease school store snack sale ; great water consumption . We also hypothesize SNaX would lead positive attitude cafeteria water , improve obesity-prevention knowledge , increase intention drink water .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Students Nutrition eXercise
DOC.criteria: school > 50 % NSLPeligible student ( proxy lowincome ) < 900 seventhgraders school < 50 % NSLPeligible student > 900 seventhgraders
